title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas - Hot Apple Cider and Caramel Apple Herbal Tea Bundle – 36 Count Tea Bags Each
descriptions:
Title: The Republic of Tea – Limited-Edition Fall Apple Teas Bundle: Hot Apple Cider + Caramel Apple Herbal – 36 Tea Bags Each

Warm up your autumn with this limited-edition duo from The Republic of Tea. This festive bundle features two caffeine-free herbal blends crafted to capture the cozy flavors of the harvest season—perfect for crisp mornings, afternoon pick-me-ups, or a soothing dessert tea.

What’s included
- Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea (36 tea bags): A naturally caffeine-free blend with the nostalgic flavors of apple cider, cinnamon, and cloves.
- Caramel Apple Herbal Tea (36 tea bags): A caffeine-free treat featuring sweet apples and vanilla atop smooth South African rooibos.

Tasting notes
- Hot Apple Cider: Apple-forward with warming cinnamon and clove, rounded by citrus and gentle spice.
- Caramel Apple: Juicy apple meets creamy caramel and vanilla, balanced by mellow rooibos.

Ingredients
- Hot Apple Cider Herbal Tea: Apple pieces, cinnamon, orange peel, rose hips, berry leaves, natural flavors, ginger root, cloves, citric acid, cardamom seeds.
- Caramel Apple Herbal Tea: Rooibos, apple bits, natural apple and caramel flavors, vanilla extract.

Caffeine level
- Both blends are caffeine-free—ideal day or night.

Steeping instructions
- Water: 6 oz per tea bag
- Temperature: Rolling boil
- Steep time: 5–7 minutes
- Tip: Add used tea bags to compost or soil.

Why you’ll love it
- Seasonal favorite: A comforting accompaniment to the harvest season.
- Dessert-ready: Satisfies sweet cravings without sugar or caffeine.
- Thoughtful gift: Beautiful for hosts, teachers, and tea lovers.

Package details
- 2 varieties, 36 tea bags each (72 total tea bags).
- Herbal tea bundle; limited-edition fall flavors.

Sip, savor, and celebrate fall with every cup.
